title: UAR: Places Matters
description: Co-Editor of Urban Affairs Review, Peter Burns, interviews authors Todd Swanstrom and Elizabeth Strom about the Book Colloquy, Place Matters. Their research can be found online at uar.sagepub.com.
content:encoded: Co-Editor of Urban Affairs Review, Peter Burns, interviews authors Todd Swanstrom and Elizabeth Strom about the Book Colloquy, Place Matters. Their research can be found online at uar.sagepub.com.
itunes:subtitle: How Place Matters: A View from the Sunbelt
